text: The Feitianshan Formation is a geological formation in China. It dates back to the Early Cretaceous. Among the known ichnofossils are footprints of dinosaurs. == Vertebrate ichnofauna == {| class="wikitable" align="center" ! colspan="6" align="center" | Ichnotaxa |- ! Ichnogenus ! Ichnopecies ! Location ! Stratigraphic position ! It may have been hunted by it. | |} == References == == Further reading == * Category:Geologic formations of China Category:Lower Cretaceous Series of Asia Category:Sandstone formations Category:Ichnofossiliferous formations
title: Feitianshan Formation
